articles.author: Jose Gomes Neto
articles.title: Brazil on course for 2019 record FX outflow of over $43 bln
articles.description: Brazil posted a foreign exchange outflow of $16.1 billion in the first four weeks of December, central bank figures on Thursday showed, putting the country on track to post a record annual FX outflow last year of more than $43 billion.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Venezuela alters oil royalty formulas, driven by new marine fuel rules
articles.description: Venezuela has changed the formulas for calculating royalties energy companies pay the government to remove references to fuel oil and some crude grades, driven by stricter rules governing marine fuel emissions, according to a document seen by Reuters.
articles.content: CARACAS (Reuters) - Venezuela has changed the formulas for calculating royalties energy companies pay the government to remove references to fuel oil and some crude grades, driven by stricter rules governing marine fuel emissions, according to a document seen… [+2291 chars]

articles.title: Cuba's Santeria priests offer some solace as country faces another tough year
articles.description: Priests from Cuba’s Afro-Cuban Santeria religion offered some solace on Thursday to worshippers facing another year of relentless U.S. sanctions, government austerity measures and shortages on the Communist-ruled island.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: U.S. stock funds lose $2.1 billion in latest week -Lipper
articles.description: U.S. equity funds recorded outflows of $2.1 billion in the latest week, according to Lipper.
articles.content:
Jan 2 (Reuters) - U.S. equity funds recorded outflows of $2.1 billion in the latest week, according to Lipper. 
U.S.-based taxable bond funds shed $699 million while U.S. money market funds attracted $21.3 billion in the week to Wednesday, Lipper data showed… [+52 chars]

articles.author: Nathan Allen
articles.title: Catalan separatists to break Spain's political deadlock
articles.description: A Catalan separatist party said on Thursday it would abstain during the Spanish parliament's upcoming vote to confirm Socialist leader Pedro Sanchez as prime minister, potentially ending the prolonged national political deadlock.
articles.content:
MADRID (Reuters) - A Catalan separatist party said on Thursday it would abstain during the Spanish parliament’s upcoming vote to confirm Socialist leader Pedro Sanchez as prime minister, potentially ending the prolonged national political deadlock.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Foreign exchange firm Travelex hit by software virus
articles.description: Foreign exchange firm Travelex said on Thursday it had taken all its systems offline after it was hit by a software virus earlier this week.
articles.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Foreign exchange firm Travelex said on Thursday it had taken all its systems offline after it was hit by a software virus earlier this week. 
“Our investigation to date shows no indication that any personal or customer data has been compro… [+558 chars]

articles.author: April Joyner
articles.title: US STOCKS-Wall St opens 2020 with new records on China stimulus, trade hopes
articles.description: Wall Street's major indexes hit record highs to open the new year on Thursday, as fresh economic stimulus from China added to optimism fueled by easing trade tensions and an improving global outlook.
articles.content:
* China cuts banks’ reserve ratios again to spur economy 
* U.S. weekly jobless claims fall 
* Casino stocks up as Macau December sales drop less than feared

articles.author: Jonathan Stempel
articles.title: Nike seeks to keep marketing executives out of Michael Avenatti trial
articles.description: Nike Inc asked a judge to block Michael Avenatti from having five of its sports marketing officials testify at his upcoming criminal trial, calling their testimony irrelevant to whether the California lawyer tried to extort the company.

articles.title: Female directors reached record highs in 2019 Hollywood
articles.description: The number of women behind the camera on Hollywood movies jumped to record levels in 2019, with 12 directing top-grossing films including "Frozen II," "Captain Marvel" and "Hustlers," two studies showed on Thursday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The number of women behind the camera on Hollywood movies jumped to record levels in 2019, with 12 directing top-grossing films including “Frozen II,” “Captain Marvel” and “Hustlers,” two studies showed on Thursday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Lebanon played no official role in Ghosn exit - minister to MTV
articles.description: Lebanon played no official role in ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn's departure from Japan, caretaker defence minister Elias Bou Saab told Lebanese broadcaster MTV on Thursday.
articles.content:
BEIRUT (Reuters) - Lebanon played no official role in ousted Nissan boss Carlos Ghosn’s departure from Japan, caretaker defence minister Elias Bou Saab told Lebanese broadcaster MTV on Thursday. 
Ghosn abruptly arrived in Beirut on Monday after fleeing Japan… [+134 chars]

articles.title: Algeria appoints new ministers, keeps some in place
articles.description: Algeria's new Prime Minister Abdelaziz Djerad has appointed a new government, keeping in place the foreign, energy and interior ministers.'
articles.content:
ALGIERS, Jan 2 (Reuters) - Algeria’s new Prime Minister Abdelaziz Djerad has appointed a new government, keeping in place the foreign, energy and interior ministers.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: FDA bans fruit, mint e-cigarette flavors
articles.description: The Trump administration on Thursday announced a ban on some popular e-cigarette flavors, including fruit and mint, to curb rising teenage use of vaping products, allowing only menthol and tobacco flavors to remain on the market.
articles.content:
Posted 
The Trump administration on Thursday announced a ban on some popular e-cigarette flavors, including fruit and mint, to curb rising teenage use of vaping products, allowing only menthol and tobacco flavors to remain on the market.
